column3: no that we have that out of the way we can proceed with an honest review. Â The pizzas good
column4: I would compare it to a well made pizza hut "pizza" that didn't skimp on the toppings
column5: or maybe a savory pizza themed "pie"
column6: calling it pizza on it's own doesn't feel quite right. Whenever I say it out loud I feel like I should be adding finger quotes
column7: but maybe that's just my hangup as a New Yorker
column8: though honestly I ascribe it more to my higher standards as a so called pizza afficiando
column9: but then again New Yorker and pizza aficionado are more or less synonymous.
